6 Design Examples of Ebook Landing Pages

Ebook landing pages are top/middle of the funnel lead magnets which give great value to potential leads. Because of the high value, ebooks attract visitors and can achieve higher conversion rates than many other lead magnets. Find out how you should design your landing pages with these top tips and templates.

High-Converting Ebook Landing Page Templates

View Landing Page

Factors Which You Can Use To Increase Conversions On Your Ebook Promotion Pages.

At Apexure, we understand the Value Proposition of the ebook and bring the value across to visitors. The page usually has a lead magnet form in which we recommend capturing name, email in exchange for the ebook.

To make landing pages for ebook promotion more effective consider testing the following elements.

Hero Image

For an Ebook Page we recommend testing out the main ebook hero shot. We have tested scenarios where we replaced a flat image of the book with a 3d mockup which has increased conversions.

Social Proof

Do you have people in your network you can give you an honest review for your book? If yes, leverage your social channels and give out your ebook for free in exchange for a testimonial which you can use on the landing page. Adding social proof is very effective technique to increase ebook sign-ups and over time as your audience will grow you can pick the best ones and add them to your page.

About The Authors

You can add test a variation in which you can add a section about the ebook author. We have tested adding this information onto our landing pages. We found that in some industries adding an author bio has proven to increase visitor opt-ins.

Co-Author Logos

If your ebook is co-authored by authors from other brands or companies, adding their brand logos would certainly add to the persuasiveness of the page.

Ready to start working on your next landing page project?

Do you want your next online campaign perform as good as these ebook landing page templates? Just reach out to us to get started on your sales funnel & landing page campaigns.
